about_the_game:
STORY:

The story of the games takes places two years after zombie apocalypse. Hero of the story is an experienced programmer who hid in his basement to develop an AI to help him fight zombies. While he was developing his AI he discovers that humans built a safe city for survivors called Heaven City. He programs his AI to have this goal in mind, however during his adventure to the Heaven City he faces unexpected challenges. During his adventure hero of the story carries some body parts of zombies, which allows him to move around unnoticeable.

GAME FEATURES:

A complex algorithm generates difficulty of every match. Traditionally matches start slow. Overtime algorithm figures out fun and interactive way to make it challenging based on your performance. Every zombie's health points is assigned by the algorithm before deploying them into the match. Your previous match will never be the same as your next match, as the algorithm is designed to not have a repetitive match. There will also be available a free mode that will entail withstanding waves and waves of zombies, to achieve highest scores.
detailed_description:
Update Notes

- Mission 3 zombies won't go through walls again.
- Line indicator, once zombies reach it player will lose points
- Minor bug fixes.


Update Notes

- Fixed bug where player didn't deal damage to zombies (sometimes)
- Fixed bug where turret selection was still active even when shop was closed.


Update Notes

New Update "Visuals" is now live.
Update includes:
- Dynamic death animation
- Enhanced graphical visuals
- Enhanced lighting.
- Minor bug fixes


Update Notes

- Fixed bug where zombies duplicated itself after being killed by laser or fire turret.
- Dead Zombie bodies now stick around longer than before.


About the Game

name: Anti Zombie AI - Tower Defense (Azai - TD)

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Anti Zombie AI - Tower Defense (Azai - TD)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core 2.5 Ghz
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800 GT
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: Challenging Tower Defense game with a procedural difficulty, interesting story and unique towers.
